comments: Disorganized, Rude, Doesn\'t care about her students. She doesn\'t know the answers to her exams and she doesn\'t clearly state what you need to know. She doesn\'t read the book to teach. She also doesn\'t even know how to teach. How can someone be the head of the dept. if you don\'t know what your talking about. Don\'t take this at HCC.

Rude.Disrespectful.Unorganized.I\'m totally baffled that this lady is the director of the program.She puts students down when they make a mistake.Snaps at students when questions are asked.Makes inappropiate comments on students weight.Switches exam dates because the material that should be discussed in class isn\'t. Would NOT recommend this program.

she is very hard to understand. does not clearly explain concepts. if you ask her a question she doesn\'t really know the answers because she just reads directly out of the book. don\'t take radiology classes with her unless you want to fail.
SHE IS VERY MEAN... NOT HELPFUL AT ALL. DON\'T TAKE RADIOLOGY COURSE AT HCC BECAUSE THEY HAVE VERY BAD TEACHER.HCC DON\'T HAVE GOOD PROGRAM.
